Payment.title: Payment
Payment.subTitle: All transactions are secure and encrypted
Payment.mercadoPagoPayment: After clicking "Pay Now", you will be redirected to Mercado Pago to complete your purchase safely.
Payment.cashPayment: You can pay for the purchase in cash at the time of receiving your order. You must have the exact cash value.
Payment.cashPaymentSecond: CASH is only accepted upon receipt of the package. If you prefer to pay by card or transfer, you must use another payment method when purchasing.

StoreBranches.title: Store branches
StoreBranches.subtitle: There is 1 store with stock
StoreBranches.usuallyReady: It is usually ready in 4 hours

PurchaseForm.title: Your Information
PurchaseForm.name: Name
PurchaseForm.description: FREE National Delivery (2 to 3 business days main cities. More than 5 business days other municipalities)

Password.subtitle: Enter your password
Password.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.
Password.ifHaveAccount: If your account exists, we’ve sent password reset instructions to your email.

Login.enterEmail: Enter your email below to login to your account.

items.title: SECURE PAYMENTS
items.description: We accept Credit and Money Orders through Mercado Pago.

items.title: EXPRESS SHIPPING
items.description: In less than 2 days you will have the package in your hands.

items.title: QUICK AND EASY CHANGES
items.description: You have up to 30 days to make exchanges and/or returns.

items.title: PREMIUM QUALITY
items.description: All our products are manufactured with the most high quality standards in Colombia.

items.question: Can you advise me?
items.answer: Of course! Write to su on Whatsapp (+57) 300 6870774.

items.question: Washing recommendations
items.answer: Review the washing instructions on the garment label. The label is located on the inside of the garment. However, we recommend washing our products with cold water and letting them dry naturally. Do not tumble dry or iron the prints.

items.question: Payment methods
items.answer: Payments on the website are processed through Mercado Pago and are 100% secure. We accept money orders.

items.question: Express Shipping
items.answer: In Dosquebradas the delivery time is 0 to 2 business days and nationally 1 to 3 business days.

items.question: Track your purchase
items.answer: Once your purchase is confirmed, you will receive an email with a real-time tracking link.

items.question: Purchase Confirmation
items.answer: You will receive a confirmation email once your purchase is confirmed. Please check your spam/junk or promotions folder before contacting us.

cap_palm_trees_pink_cake.name: Cap Palm Trees - Pink Cake
cap_palm_trees_pink_cake.description: 5-panel Trucker cap Pink Cake in cotton and back mesh. Palm Trees design embroidered on the front in high relief and embroidered on the sides with low relief.

cap_lm_studios_black_and_white.name: Cap LM Studios - Black and White
cap_lm_studios_black_and_white.description: Cap with Trucker 5-panel White and Black color on cotton and back mesh. LM design embroidered on the front in high relief and embroidered on the sides with low relief.

gradient_beanie_monoic_brown_and_white.name: Gradient Beanie Monoic - Brown and White
gradient_beanie_monoic_brown_and_white.description: Beanie made in brown and white knit fabric. It has a gradient finish and has the "MONOIC" logo woven on the front.

logo_oversized_v2_t_shirt_dark_black.name: Logo Oversized V2 T-shirt - Dark Black
logo_oversized_v2_t_shirt_dark_black.description: Dark Black Short Sleeve T-shirt with fit oversized, made of high grammage premium cotton jersey. The shirt has a round rib collar and the "Monoic" logo is stamped on the back.

gradient_beanie_monoic_gray.name: Gradient Beanie Monoic - Gray
gradient_beanie_monoic_gray.description: Beanie made of black and gray knit fabric. It has a gradient finish and has the "MONOIC" logo woven on the front.

rebuild_t_shirt_sand.name: Rebuild T-shirt - Sand
rebuild_t_shirt_sand.description: Sand colored short sleeve t-shirt with oversized fit, made of high grammage premium cotton jersey. The t-shirt has a round rib collar and high-relief silkscreen print on the back.

logo_oversized_v2_t_shirt_off_white.name: Logo Oversized V2 T-shirt - Off White
logo_oversized_v2_t_shirt_off_white.description: Off White short-sleeved t-shirt with fit oversized, made of high-grammed premium cotton jersey. The shirt has a round rib collar and the "Monoic" logo is stamped on the back.

logo_oversized_v2_lila_t_shirt.name: Logo Oversized V2 - Lila T-shirt
logo_oversized_v2_lila_t_shirt.description: Lila color short sleeve t-shirt with fit oversized, made of high grammage premium cotton jersey. The shirt has a round rib collar and the "Monoic" logo is stamped on the back.

cap_monoic_studios_black_and_white.name: Cap Monoic Studios - Black and White
cap_monoic_studios_black_and_white.description: Cap with Trucker 5-panel White and Black color on cotton and back mesh. Monoic Studios design embroidered on the front in high relief and embroidered on the sides with low relief.

sunset_dreams_cap_light_blue.name: Sunset Dreams Cap - Light Blue
sunset_dreams_cap_light_blue.description: Tour with Trucker 5-panel trough Light Blue in cotton and back mesh. Sunset Dreams design embroidered on the front in high relief and embroidered on the sides with low relief.

metro_t_shirt_dark_black.name: Metro T-shirt - Dark Black
metro_t_shirt_dark_black.description: Dark Black Short Sleeve T-shirt with oversized fit, made of high grammage premium cotton jersey. The t-shirt has a round rib collar and a seamless screen print on the back.

logo_oversized_v2_t_shirt_worn_gray.name: Logo Oversized V2 T-shirt - Worn Gray
logo_oversized_v2_t_shirt_worn_gray.description: Short sleeve shirt Gray Worn with fit oversized, made of high grammage premium cotton jersey. The shirt has a round rib collar and the "Monoic" logo is stamped on the back.

denim_jacket_classic_blue.name: Denim Jacket - Classic Blue
denim_jacket_classic_blue.description: Classic Blue short-sleeved denim jacket, with two front pockets and monogram at the bottom left of the garment. Made of 100% cotton for a casual and fresh look.

denim_jacket_dark_black.name: Denim Jacket - Dark Black
denim_jacket_dark_black.description: Dark Black short-sleeved denim jacket with two front pockets and monogram at the bottom left of the garment. Made of 100% cotton for a casual and fresh look.

denim_jacket_baby_blue.name: Denim Jacket - Baby Blue
denim_jacket_baby_blue.description: Baby Blue short-sleeved denim jacket, with two front pockets and monogram at the bottom left of the garment. Made of 100% cotton for a casual and fresh look.

monoic_windbreaker_jacket_beige.name: Monoic Windbreaker Jacket - Beige
monoic_windbreaker_jacket_beige.description: Windbreaker Jacket Monoic color Beige. Folding jacket with elastic waist and hood adjusters, double front pocket, zip neck closure and adjustable velcro wrists. Monogram embroidery in the front center of the jacket and "Monoic" in left sleeve in black.

monoic_windbreaker_jacket_gray.name: Monoic Windbreaker Jacket - Gray
monoic_windbreaker_jacket_gray.description: Windbreaker Jacket Monoic Gray color. Folding jacket with elastic waist and hood adjusters, double front pocket, zip neck closure and adjustable velcro wrists. Monogram embroidery in the front center of the jacket and "Monoic" in left sleeve in black.

monoic_windbreaker_jacket_dark_black.name: Monoic Windbreaker Jacket - Dark Black
monoic_windbreaker_jacket_dark_black.description: Windbreaker Jacket Monoic Dark Black color. Folding jacket with elastic waist and hood adjusters, double front pocket, zip neck closure and adjustable velcro wrists. Monogram embroidery in the front center of the jacket and "Monoic" in white left sleeve.

hoodie_basic_v2_off_white.name: Hoodie Basic V2 - Off White
hoodie_basic_v2_off_white.description: Hoodie basic V2 color Off White made of high grammage cotton. Pre shrunken and dyed in a piece made to obtain the highest quality and finish. Fists and waist in Rib, front pocket kangaroo type and our logo "Monoic" in high relief screen printing on the left breastplate.

quarter_zip_v2_worn_gray.name: Quarter Zip V2 - worn Gray
quarter_zip_v2_worn_gray.description: Quarter Zip V2 oversized in worn Gray color made of high grammage Premium Cotton. The garment has rib cuffs and our "Monoic" print in high-relief silkscreen on the white back.

hoodie_basic_v2_lila.name: Hoodie Basic V2 - Lila
hoodie_basic_v2_lila.description: Hoodie Basic V2 Lilac color made of high grammage cotton. Pre shrunken and dyed in a piece made to obtain the highest quality and finish. Fists and waist in Rib, front pocket kangaroo type and our logo "Monoic" in high relief screen printing on the left breastplate.

trashed_hoodie_rush_worn_black.name: Trashed Hoodie Rush - Worn Black
trashed_hoodie_rush_worn_black.description: Trashed Hoodie in Worn Black, color, has an oversized fit and is made of high grammage cotton. The hoodie is pre-shrunk and dyed in a piece made to obtain the highest quality and finish. The cuffs and waist are in rib with a wear that gives it the "transhed" aesthetic, and the front kangaroo pocket was removed. It is stamped in seamless screen printing with our multi-colored NYC design on the back.

hoodie_sunset_dreams_light_blue.name: Hoodie Sunset Dreams - Light Blue
hoodie_sunset_dreams_light_blue.description: Hoodie Sunset Dreams in Light Blue, has a new fit oversized and is made of high grammage cotton. The hoodie is pre-shrunk and dyed in a piece made to obtain the highest quality and finish. The cuffs and waist are on Rib, it has a kangaroo-like front pocket, and it's stamped in touchless screen printing on our Sunset Dreams chart on the back.

basic_hoodie_navy_blue.name: Basic Hoodie - Navy Blue
basic_hoodie_navy_blue.description: Basic Navy Blue Hoodie made of heavyweight cotton. Pre-shrunk and dyed in a ready-made piece to obtain maximum quality and finish. Rib cuffs and waist, front kangaroo pocket and rubber with "Monoic" logo on the left pectoral.

hoodie_basic_v2_dark_black.name: Hoodie Basic V2 - Dark Black
hoodie_basic_v2_dark_black.description: Basic Hoodie V2 Dark Black color made of high grammage cotton. Pre shrunken and dyed in a piece made to obtain the highest quality and finish. Fists and waist in Rib, front pocket kangaroo type and our logo "Monoic" in high relief screen printing on the left breastplate.

zip_jacket_monoic_studios_light_gray.name: Zip Jacket Monoic Studios - Light Gray
zip_jacket_monoic_studios_light_gray.description: Jacket made of Light Gray cotton with front zipper, high neck and front pockets. Pre shrunken jacket, cuffs and waist at Rib. Fear Will Lose print in touchless screen printing on the back.

cargo_pants_cream.name: Cargo Pants - Cream
cargo_pants_cream.description: Cargo Straight boot pants in Ripstop cotton. Cream color with front, side and back pockets with a slightly loose fit. Monogram embroidered on right pocket and "Monoic Studios" embroidered on left side pocket.

wide_fit_jean_classic_washed_blue.name: Wide Fit Jean Classic - Washed Blue
wide_fit_jean_classic_washed_blue.description: Jean made in Cotton Denim with a Wide Fit. Color "Washed Blue" giving a washing effect. Metallic "Monogram" applique under the left front pocket and MONOIC frame at the back of the waist..

logo_oversized_v2_t_shirt_mint_green.name: Logo Oversized V2 T-shirt - Mint Green
logo_oversized_v2_t_shirt_mint_green.description: Mint Green Short Sleeve T-shirt with fit oversized, made of high grammage premium cotton jersey. The shirt has a round rib collar and the "Monoic" logo is stamped on the back.

fly_high_cap_olive_green.name: Fly High Cap - Olive Green
fly_high_cap_olive_green.description: Cap with New 5-panel Trucker last without structure on the front, olive green in cotton. Fly High design embroidered on the front with high relief, and embroidered on the sides with low relief.

wide_fit_jean_distressed_denim.name: Wide Fit Jean - Distressed Denim
wide_fit_jean_distressed_denim.description: Dark Black short-sleeved denim jacket with two front pockets and monogram at the bottom left of the garment. Made of 100% cotton for a casual and fresh look.

monoic_trousers_dark_black.name: Monoic Trousers - Dark Black
monoic_trousers_dark_black.description: Trousers with a straight boot fit (large size, consider choosing a size smaller than usual). Dark Black color with 4 pockets between front and rear. Made of 100% cotton.

zip_knit_sweater_dark_black.name: Zip Knit Sweater - Dark Black
zip_knit_sweater_dark_black.description: Zip Knit Sweater Monoic Dark Black color, sweater with a Slim fit made of cotton. The sweater is pre-shrunken, with fists and waist at Rib. rubber with "Monoic" logo on the left arm.

polo_sweater_cream.name: Polo Sweater - Cream
polo_sweater_cream.description: Knit Polo Sweater Monoic cream color, sweater with a slightly oversized regular fit made of cotton. The sweater is pre-shrunken, with fists, neck and waist at Rib. MONOIC embroidery on the chest.

limited_edition_aviator_leather_jacket_b.name: Limited Edition | Aviator Leather Jacket - Black
limited_edition_aviator_leather_jacket_b.description: Our star product from the collection. Designed for those looking for a timeless garment, this jacket not only resists the passage of time, but improves with it. Limited to solo 15 units, is made of 100% calf leather with a slightly boxy fit, following the highest quality standards to guarantee a unique and durable appearance. It has two front pockets, a metal monogram on the left breastplate and "Monoic New York" embroidery on the back. Fists and waist in rib.

nyc_t_shirt_dark_black.name: NYC T-shirt - Dark Black
nyc_t_shirt_dark_black.description: Dark Black Short Sleeve T-shirt with oversized fit, made of high grammage premium cotton jersey. The t-shirt has a round rib collar and a seamless screen print on the back.

cap_monoic_studios_cobalt_blue.name: Cap Monoic Studios - Cobalt Blue
cap_monoic_studios_cobalt_blue.description: Cap with Trucker 5-panel blue Cobalt blue last on cotton and back mesh. Monoic Studios design embroidered on the front in high relief and embroidered on the sides with low relief.

hoodie_basic_v2_mint_green.name: Hoodie Basic V2 - Mint Green
hoodie_basic_v2_mint_green.description: Basic Hoodie V2 Mint Green made of high grammage cotton. Pre shrunken and dyed in a piece made to obtain the highest quality and finish. Fists and waist in Rib, front pocket kangaroo type and our logo "Monoic" in high relief screen printing on the left breastplate.

wide_fit_jean_raw_denim.name: Wide Fit Jean - Raw Denim
wide_fit_jean_raw_denim.description: Jean made in Cotton Denim with a Wide Fit. Metallic "Monogram" applique under the left front pocket and MONOIC frame at the back of the waist.

trousers_monoic_navy_blue.name: Trousers Monoic - Navy Blue
trousers_monoic_navy_blue.description: Trousers with a straight boot fit (large size, consider choosing a size smaller than usual). Navy blue color with 4 pockets between front and rear. Made of 100% cotton.

wide_fit_jean_rusty.name: Wide Fit Jean - Rusty
wide_fit_jean_rusty.description: Jean made in Cotton Denim with a Wide Fit. Color "Soft Sand" giving a sand-colored washing effect. Metallic "Monogram" applique under the left front pocket and MONOIC frame at the back of the waist.

wide_fit_jean_mouse_gray.name: Wide Fit Jean - Mouse Gray
wide_fit_jean_mouse_gray.description: Jean made in Cotton Denim with a Wide Fit. Metallic "Monogram" applique under the left front pocket and MONOIC frame at the back of the waist.

gradient_fuzzy_black_and_white_sweater.name: Gradient Fuzzy - Black and White Sweater
gradient_fuzzy_black_and_white_sweater.description: Sweater Monoic color Black and White, sweater with a slightly oversized fit made of rabbit fur fabric. The sweater is pre-shrunken, with fists, neck and waist at Rib. Very soft to the touch and MONOIC embroidery on the chest.

gradient_knit_sweater_monoic_ny_gray_and.name: Gradient Knit Sweater Monoic NY - Gray and Black
gradient_knit_sweater_monoic_ny_gray_and.description: Knit Sweater Monoic NY Gray and Black color, sweater with a slightly oversized fit made of 100% cotton. The sweater is pre-shrunken, with fists, neck and waist at Rib. Monoic New York print on the back.

gradient_fuzzy_sweater_white_and_brown.name: Gradient Fuzzy - Sweater White and Brown
gradient_fuzzy_sweater_white_and_brown.description: Sweater Monoic color Coffee and White, sweater with a slightly oversized fit made of rabbit fur fabric. The sweater is pre-shrunken, with fists, neck and waist at Rib. Very soft to the touch and MONOIC embroidery on the chest.

knit_cardigan_dark_black.name: Knit Cardigan - Dark Black
knit_cardigan_dark_black.description: Knit Cardigan Monoic Dark Black color, sweater with a slightly oversized regular fit made of 100% cotton. The sweater is pre-shrunken, with fists and waist at Rib. MONOIC metal monogram on the left breastplate.

knit_cardigan_baby_pink.name: Knit Cardigan - Baby Pink
knit_cardigan_baby_pink.description: Knit Cardigan Monoic Baby Pink, sweater with a slightly oversized regular fit made of 100% cotton. The sweater is pre-shrunken, with fists and waist at Rib. MONOIC metal monogram on the left breastplate.

zip_knit_sweater_cream.name: Zip Knit Sweater - Cream
zip_knit_sweater_cream.description: Zip Knit Sweater Monoic color Cream, sweater with a Slim fit made of cotton. The sweater is pre-shrunken, with fists and waist at Rib. rubber with "Monoic" logo on the left arm.
